name: Rotato (Alvaro Marco, 三-ti, M.L.Shad)
description:
Welcome to this silly speedy rockabilly compilation of minigames!

Rotato is about those brave, knave, depraved mouses whose crave for cheese took them to the most inexplicable places. Always guided by roundness, these mice rotated their fate and that of all existence to achieve their ultimate goal: C H E E S E
